data.text:
We are happy to announce that Detective IQ in one of the winner of WinZO Bharat Tech Triumph Program (2nd Edition). We thank you WinZO and the jury for this. We are super excited that MindYourLogic will represent India at Gamescom Latam Sao Paulo, Brazil. Think Puzzle, Think MindYourLogic. #MindYourLogic #Team #Games

Our home grown IP Detective Mehul is now watched on Youtube in 50 plus countries with kenya leading the charts in international viewership with 200 thousand unique monthly viewers !!! This is just the start !!! We will be adding more countries ðŸ¤  Think Puzzle, Think MindYourLogic.

We're excited to share that our game Detective IQ is now in the top 200 games in India! We can't wait to keep climbing the rankings. Our whole team is really excited about it. Stay with us as we aim higher and keep working to make our game even better! Think Puzzle, Think MindYourLogic #Gaming #TeamSuccess #TopGames #MindYourLogic
